Summary: Riding the bus the whole bus saw it.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was riding the bus and looking out my window and saw a disk it had blue lights and a yellow one in the middle do you know what it is? i was shocked at the scene, and could not move.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around December 15th 2008
